df-er
blocks.content: Define the equivalence relation predicate. Our notation is not standard. A formal notation doesn't seem to exist in the literature; instead only informal English tends to be used. The present definition, although somewhat cryptic, nicely avoids dummy variables. In ~ dfer2 we derive a more typical definition. We show that an equivalence relation is reflexive, symmetric, and transitive in ~ erref , ~ ersymb , and ~ ertr . (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Nov-2015.)

blocks.name: dfer2

  |- wb(wer(c0, c1), w3a(wrel(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), c1), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wa(wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {

  3bitr3i(wss(cun(ccnv(c0), ccom(c0, c0)), c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wa(wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))))), wa(wss(ccnv(c0), c0), wss(ccom(c0, c0), c0)), wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))))))

  cnvsym(s0, s1, c0)

  unss(`' c0, c0, (c0 ‚àò c0))
  bitr2i((‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s1[c0]s0)))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c0]s2))))), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s1[c0]s0)‚àß((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c0]s2))))), ‚àÄ(s0,(‚àÄ(s1,(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s1[c0]s0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c0]s2))))))
  albii(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s1[c0]s0)‚àß((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c0]s2)))), (‚àÄ(s1,(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s1[c0]s0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c0]s2)))))
  bitri(‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s1[c0]s0)‚àß((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c0]s2)))), (‚àÄ(s1,(s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s1[c0]s0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c0]s2)))), ‚àÄ(s1,((s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s1[c0]s0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c0]s2)))))

blocks.name: df-ec
blocks.content: Define the ` R ` -coset of ` A ` . Exercise 35 of [Enderton] p. 61. This is called the equivalence class of ` A ` modulo ` R ` when ` R ` is an equivalence relation (i.e. when ` Er R ` ; see ~ dfer2 ). In this case, ` A ` is a representative (member) of the equivalence class ` [ A ] R ` , which contains all sets that are equivalent to ` A ` . Definition of [Enderton] p. 57 uses the notation ` [ A ] ` (subscript) ` R ` , although we simply follow the brackets by ` R ` since we don't have subscripted expressions. For an alternate definition, see ~ dfec2 . (Contributed by NM, 23-Jul-1995.)

blocks.name: dfec2
blocks.content: Alternate definition of ` R ` -coset of ` A ` . Definition 34 of [Suppes] p. 81. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-1997.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: ecexg
blocks.content: An equivalence class modulo a set is a set. (Contributed by NM, 24-Jul-1995.)

blocks.name: ecexr
blocks.content: A nonempty equivalence class implies the representative is a set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: df-qs
blocks.content: Define quotient set. ` R ` is usually an equivalence relation. Definition of [Enderton] p. 58. (Contributed by NM, 23-Jul-1995.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-qs(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cqs(c0, c1), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cec(cv(s1), c1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
}

thm ereq1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wer(c0, c2), wer(c1, c2)))
} = {
  3bitr4g(wceq(c0, c1), wer(c0, c2), wer(c1, c2), w3a(wrel(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), c2), wss(cun(ccnv(c0), ccom(c0, c0)), c0)), w3a(wrel(c1), wceq(cdm(c1), c2), wss(cun(ccnv(c1), ccom(c1, c1)), c1)))
  3anbi123d(wceq(c0, c1), wrel(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), c2), wss(cun(ccnv(c0), ccom(c0, c0)), c0), wrel(c1), wceq(cdm(c1), c2), wss(cun(ccnv(c1), ccom(c1, c1)), c1))
  releq(c0, c1)
  eqeq1d(cdm(c0), c2, cdm(c1), wceq(c0, c1))
  dmeq(c0, c1)
  bitrd(wceq(c0, c1), wss(cun(ccnv(c0), ccom(c0, c0)), c0), wss(cun(ccnv(c1), ccom(c1, c1)), c1), wss(cun(ccnv(c1), ccom(c1, c1)), c0))
  sseq1d(cun(ccnv(c0), ccom(c0, c0)), c0, cun(ccnv(c1), ccom(c1, c1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  uneq12d(ccnv(c0), ccom(c0, c0), ccnv(c1), ccom(c1, c1), wceq(c0, c1))
  cnveq(c0, c1)
  eqtrd(ccom(c0, c0), ccom(c1, c1), ccom(c1, c0), wceq(c0, c1))
  coeq1(c0, c1, c0)
  coeq2(c0, c1, c1)
  sseq2(c0, c1, cun(ccnv(c1), ccom(c1, c1)))
  df-er(c0, c2)
  df-er(c1, c2)
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 = c1 ‚Üí(c0[Er]c2 ‚Üî c1[Er]c2))
} = {
  3bitr4g(c0 = c1, c0[Er]c2, c1[Er]c2, (Rel(c0)‚àß dom(c0)= c2 ‚àß(`' c0 ‚ãÉ(c0 ‚àò c0))‚äÜ c0), (Rel(c1)‚àß dom(c1)= c2 ‚àß(`' c1 ‚ãÉ(c1 ‚àò c1))‚äÜ c1))

blocks.name: ersym
blocks.content: An equivalence relation is symmetric. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ersym(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wer(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c0))
} = {
  mpd(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2))
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0))
  syl(w0, wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0)), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe)))
  syl2anc(w0, wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe)), wrel(c1), wbr(c2, c1, c0))
  syl(w0, wrel(c1), wer(c1, c3))
  errel(c1, c3)
  brrelex12(c1, c2, c0)
  ancoms(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wb(wbr(c0, ccnv(c1), c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0)))
  brcnvg(c0, universe, c2, universe, c1)
  ssbrd(c0, ccnv(c1), c2, c1, w0)
  unssad(ccnv(c1), c1, ccom(c1, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(cun(ccnv(c1), ccom(c1, c1)), c1), wer(c1, c3))
  simp3bi(wer(c1, c3), wss(cun(ccnv(c1), ccom(c1, c1)), c1), wrel(c1), wceq(cdm(c1), c3))
  df-er(c1, c3)
}

thm ersym(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0[c1]c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1[Er]c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2[c1]c0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, c0[c1]c2, c0[`' c1]c2)
  mpbird(w0, c0[`' c1]c2, c2[c1]c0)
  syl(w0, (c0[`' c1]c2 ‚Üî c2[c1]c0), (c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c0 ‚àà ùïå))
  syl2anc(w0, (c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß c0 ‚àà ùïå), Rel(c1), c2[c1]c0)
  syl(w0, Rel(c1), c1[Er]c3)
  errel(c1, c3)
  brrelex12(c1, c2, c0)
  ancoms(c2 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà ùïå, (c0[`' c1]c2 ‚Üî c2[c1]c0))
  brcnvg(c0, universe, c2, universe, c1)
  ssbrd(c0, `' c1, c2, c1, w0)
  unssad(`' c1, c1, (c1 ‚àò c1), w0)
  syl(w0, (`' c1 ‚ãÉ(c1 ‚àò c1))‚äÜ c1, c1[Er]c3)
  simp3bi(c1[Er]c3, (`' c1 ‚ãÉ(c1 ‚àò c1))‚äÜ c1, Rel(c1), dom(c1)= c3)
  df-er(c1, c3)
}

thm ertr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wer(c1, c4))
} = {
  syld(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, c1, c3), wbr(c0, ccom(c1, c1), c3))
  ex(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wbr(c0, ccom(c1, c1), c3))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3))), wbr(c0, ccom(c1, c1), c3), wex(hs0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, c3))))
  elabd(hs0, c2, wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3))), wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, c3)), wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)))
  syl2an(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wcel(c2, universe), wrel(c1), wbr(c2, c1, c3))
  brrelex1(c1, c2, c3)
  simpr(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, c3), wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0, c1)
  breq1(cv(hs0), c2, c1, c3)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3))), wb(wbr(c0, ccom(c1, c1), c3), wex(hs0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c1, c3)))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  syl2an(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wcel(c0, universe), wrel(c1), wbr(c0, c1, c2))
  simpl(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3))
  brrelex1(c1, c0, c2)
  syl2an(w0, wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)), wcel(c3, universe), wrel(c1), wbr(c2, c1, c3))
  syl(w0, wrel(c1), wer(c1, c4))
  errel(c1, c4)
  simpr(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3))
  brrelex2(c1, c2, c3)
  brcog(hs0, c0, universe, c3, universe, c1, c1)
  ssbrd(c0, ccom(c1, c1), c3, c1, w0)
  unssbd(ccom(c1, c1), c1, ccnv(c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(cun(ccnv(c1), ccom(c1, c1)), c1), wer(c1, c4))
  simp3bi(wer(c1, c4), wss(cun(ccnv(c1), ccom(c1, c1)), c1), wrel(c1), wceq(cdm(c1), c4))
  df-er(c1, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm ertr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3)‚Üí c0[c1]c3))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1[Er]c4)
} = {
  syld(w0, (c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3), c0[c1]c3, c0[(c1 ‚àò c1)]c3)
  ex(w0, (c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3), c0[(c1 ‚àò c1)]c3)
  mpbird((w0 ‚àß(c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3)), c0[(c1 ‚àò c1)]c3, ‚àÉ(hs0,(c0[c1]hs0 ‚àß hs0[c1]c3)))
  elabd(hs0, c2, (w0 ‚àß(c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3)), (c0[c1]hs0 ‚àß hs0[c1]c3), (c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3))
  syl2an(w0, (c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3), c2 ‚àà ùïå, Rel(c1), c2[c1]c3)
  brrelex1(c1, c2, c3)
  simpr(w0, (c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c2, c0[c1]hs0, hs0[c1]c3, c0[c1]c2, c2[c1]c3)
  breq2(hs0, c2, c0, c1)
  breq1(hs0, c2, c1, c3)
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß(c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3)), (c0[(c1 ‚àò c1)]c3 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs0,(c0[c1]hs0 ‚àß hs0[c1]c3))), c0 ‚àà ùïå, c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl2an(w0, (c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3), c0 ‚àà ùïå, Rel(c1), c0[c1]c2)
  simpl(c0[c1]c2, c2[c1]c3)
  brrelex1(c1, c0, c2)
  syl2an(w0, (c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3), c3 ‚àà ùïå, Rel(c1), c2[c1]c3)
  syl(w0, Rel(c1), c1[Er]c4)
  errel(c1, c4)
  simpr(c0[c1]c2, c2[c1]c3)
  brrelex2(c1, c2, c3)
  brcog(hs0, c0, universe, c3, universe, c1, c1)
  ssbrd(c0, (c1 ‚àò c1), c3, c1, w0)
  unssbd((c1 ‚àò c1), c1, `' c1, w0)
  syl(w0, (`' c1 ‚ãÉ(c1 ‚àò c1))‚äÜ c1, c1[Er]c4)
  simp3bi(c1[Er]c4, (`' c1 ‚ãÉ(c1 ‚àò c1))‚äÜ c1, Rel(c1), dom(c1)= c4)
  df-er(c1, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0[c1]c2 ‚àß c2[c1]c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: erref
blocks.content: An equivalence relation is reflexive on its field. Compare Theorem 3M of [Enderton] p. 56. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm erref(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wer(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
} = {
  exlimddv(hs0, w0, wbr(c0, c1, c0), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)))
  mpbid(w0, wex(hs0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
  eleqtrrd(c0, cdm(c1), c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(c1), c2), wer(c1, c2))
  erdm(c1, c2)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cdm(c1)), wex(hs0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)))), wcel(c0, c2))
  eldmg(hs0, c0, c2, c1)
  ertr4d(c0, c1, c0, c2, cv(hs0), wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wer(c1, c2))
  simpr(w0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(c0, c1, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm erref(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0[c1]c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1[Er]c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c2)
} = {
  exlimddv(hs0, w0, c0[c1]c0, c0[c1]hs0)
  mpbid(w0, ‚àÉ(hs0, c0[c1]hs0), c0 ‚àà dom(c1))
  eleqtrrd(c0, dom(c1), c2, w0)
  syl(w0, dom(c1)= c2, c1[Er]c2)
  erdm(c1, c2)
  syl(w0, (c0 ‚àà dom(c1)‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs0, c0[c1]hs0)), c0 ‚àà c2)
  eldmg(hs0, c0, c2, c1)
  ertr4d(c0, c1, c0, c2, hs0, (w0 ‚àß c0[c1]hs0))
  adantr(w0, c0[c1]hs0, c1[Er]c2)
  simpr(w0, c0[c1]hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0[c1]c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: ercnv
blocks.content: The converse of an equivalence relation is itself. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ercnv(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0))
} = {
  mpancom(wer(c0, c1), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0), wrel(c0))
  errel(c0, c1)
  mpanl1(wrel(c0), wer(c0, c1), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0), wrel(ccnv(c0)))
  relcnv(c0)
  eqrelrdv2(hs0, hs1, ccnv(c0), c0, wer(c0, c1))
  3bitr3g(wer(c0, c1), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(c0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), c0), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))
  ersymb(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0), c1, wer(c0, c1))
  id(wer(c0, c1))
  bitr3i(wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), ccnv(c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), ccnv(c0), cv(hs1)))
  brcnv(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  df-br(cv(hs0), ccnv(c0), cv(hs1))
  df-br(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(ccnv(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(ccnv(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wer(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wer(c0, c1))
}

thm ercnv(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[Er]c1 ‚Üí `' c0 = c0)
} = {
  mpancom(c0[Er]c1, `' c0 = c0, Rel(c0))
  errel(c0, c1)
  mpanl1(Rel(c0), c0[Er]c1, `' c0 = c0, Rel(`' c0))
  relcnv(c0)
  eqrelrdv2(hs0, hs1, `' c0, c0, c0[Er]c1)
  3bitr3g(c0[Er]c1, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà `' c0, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà c0, hs1[c0]hs0, hs0[c0]hs1)
  ersymb(hs1, c0, hs0, c1, c0[Er]c1)
  id(c0[Er]c1)
  bitr3i(hs1[c0]hs0, < hs0, hs1 > ‚àà `' c0, hs0[`' c0]hs1)
  brcnv(hs0, c0, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(hs1)
  df-br(hs0, `' c0, hs1)
  df-br(hs0, c0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(`' c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(`' c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0[Er]c1)
  diff.hs1.w(c0[Er]c1)
}

blocks.name: errn
blocks.content: The range and domain of an equivalence relation are equal. (Contributed by Rodolfo Medina, 11-Oct-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: erssxp
blocks.content: An equivalence relation is a subset of the cartesian product of the field. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: erex
blocks.content: An equivalence relation is a set if its domain is a set. (Contributed by Rodolfo Medina, 15-Oct-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: erexb
blocks.content: An equivalence relation is a set if and only if its domain is a set. (Contributed by Rodolfo Medina, 15-Oct-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: iserd
blocks.content: A reflexive, symmetric, transitive relation is an equivalence relation on its domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm iserd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wer(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wrel(c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))
  -| wi(w0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wer(c0, c1), wer(c0, cdm(c0)))
  syl(w0, wb(wer(c0, cdm(c0)), wer(c0, c1)), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
  eqrdv(s0, cdm(c0), c1, w0)
  bitr4d(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))
  impbid1(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))
  ex(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))
  erref(cv(s0), c0, cdm(c0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)), wer(c0, cdm(c0)))
  syl3anbrc(w0, wer(c0, cdm(c0)), wrel(c0), wceq(cdm(c0), cdm(c0)), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wa(wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))))))
  eqidd(cdm(c0), w0)
  alrimiv(s0, w0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wa(wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))))))
  alrimiv(s1, w0, wal(s2, wa(wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))))
  alrimiv(s2, w0, wa(wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))))
  jca(w0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))
  ex(w0, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  ex(w0, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))
  dfer2(s0, s1, s2, c0, cdm(c0))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdm(c0)))
  breldm(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
  ereq2(cdm(c0), c1, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iserd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0[Er]c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí Rel(c0))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0[c0]s1)‚Üí s1[c0]s0)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2))‚Üí s0[c0]s2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî s0[c0]s0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, c0[Er]c1, c0[Er]dom(c0))
  syl(w0, (c0[Er]dom(c0)‚Üî c0[Er]c1), dom(c0)= c1)
  eqrdv(s0, dom(c0), c1, w0)
  bitr4d(w0, s0 ‚àà dom(c0), s0 ‚àà c1, s0[c0]s0)
  impbid1(w0, s0 ‚àà dom(c0), s0[c0]s0)
  ex(w0, s0 ‚àà dom(c0), s0[c0]s0)
  erref(s0, c0, dom(c0), (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà dom(c0)))
  adantr(w0, s0 ‚àà dom(c0), c0[Er]dom(c0))
  syl3anbrc(w0, c0[Er]dom(c0), Rel(c0), dom(c0)= dom(c0), ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s1[c0]s0)‚àß((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c0]s2))))))
  eqidd(dom(c0), w0)
  alrimiv(s0, w0, ‚àÄ(s1, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s1[c0]s0)‚àß((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c0]s2)))))
  alrimiv(s1, w0, ‚àÄ(s2,((s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s1[c0]s0)‚àß((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c0]s2))))
  alrimiv(s2, w0, ((s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s1[c0]s0)‚àß((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c0]s2)))
  jca(w0, (s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s1[c0]s0), ((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c0]s2))
  ex(w0, s0[c0]s1, s1[c0]s0)
  ex(w0, (s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2), s0[c0]s2)
  dfer2(s0, s1, s2, c0, dom(c0))
  simpr(w0, s0 ‚àà dom(c0))
  breldm(s0, c0, s0)
  vex(s0)
  ereq2(dom(c0), c1, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
}

blocks.name: iseri
blocks.content: A reflexive, symmetric, transitive relation is an equivalence relation on its domain. Inference version of ~ iserd , which avoids the need to provide a "dummy antecedent" ` ph ` if there is no natural one to choose. (Contributed by AV, 30-Apr-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm iseri(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wer(c0, c1)
  -| wrel(c0)
  -| wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  -| wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))
  -| wb(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  mptru(wer(c0, c1))
  iserd(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wrel(c0))
  adantl(wtru, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  adantl(wtru, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))
  a1i(wtru, wb(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))))
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
  diff.wtru.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iseri(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ c0[Er]c1
  ‚ä£ Rel(c0)
  ‚ä£ (s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s1[c0]s0)
  ‚ä£ ((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c0]s2)
  ‚ä£ (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî s0[c0]s0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  mptru(c0[Er]c1)
  iserd(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, Rel(c0))
  adantl(wtru, s0[c0]s1, s1[c0]s0)
  adantl(wtru, (s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2), s0[c0]s2)
  a1i(wtru, (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî s0[c0]s0))
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
  diff.wtru.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: iseriALT
blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ iseri , avoiding the usage of ~ mptru and ` T. ` as antecedent by using ~ ax-mp and one of the hypotheses as antecedent. This results, however, in a slightly longer proof. (Contributed by AV, 30-Apr-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm iseriALT(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wer(c0, c1)
  -| wrel(c0)
  -| wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  -| wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))
  -| wb(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  ax-mp(wer(c0, c1), wrel(c0))
  iserd(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, wrel(c0))
  id(wrel(c0))
  adantl(wrel(c0), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  adantl(wrel(c0), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))
  a1i(wrel(c0), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))))
  diff.wrel.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wrel.s(s1, c0)
  diff.wrel.s(s2, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iseriALT(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ c0[Er]c1
  ‚ä£ Rel(c0)
  ‚ä£ (s0[c0]s1 ‚Üí s1[c0]s0)
  ‚ä£ ((s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2)‚Üí s0[c0]s2)
  ‚ä£ (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî s0[c0]s0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  ax-mp(c0[Er]c1, Rel(c0))
  iserd(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, Rel(c0))
  id(Rel(c0))
  adantl(Rel(c0), s0[c0]s1, s1[c0]s0)
  adantl(Rel(c0), (s0[c0]s1 ‚àß s1[c0]s2), s0[c0]s2)
  a1i(Rel(c0), (s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî s0[c0]s0))
  diff.wrel.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wrel.s(s1, c0)
  diff.wrel.s(s2, c0)
}

blocks.name: brdifun
blocks.content: Evaluate the incomparability relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm brdifun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wbr(c0, c3, c2), wn(wo(wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c4, c0)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cdif(cxp(c1, c1), cun(c4, ccnv(c4))))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, c3, c2), wn(wo(wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c4, c0))), wn(wbr(c0, cun(c4, ccnv(c4)), c2)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wb(wbr(c0, c3, c2), wn(wbr(c0, cun(c4, ccnv(c4)), c2))), wbr(c0, cxp(c1, c1), c2))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, cxp(c1, c1), c2), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c1)))
  opelxpi(c0, c1, c2, c1)
  df-br(c0, cxp(c1, c1), c2)
  baib(wbr(c0, cxp(c1, c1), c2), wbr(c0, c3, c2), wn(wbr(c0, cun(c4, ccnv(c4)), c2)))
  bitri(wbr(c0, c3, c2), wa(wbr(c0, cxp(c1, c1), c2), wn(wbr(c0, cun(c4, ccnv(c4)), c2))), wbr(c0, cdif(cxp(c1, c1), cun(c4, ccnv(c4))), c2))
  breqi(c0, c3, c2, cdif(cxp(c1, c1), cun(c4, ccnv(c4))))
  brdif(c0, cxp(c1, c1), cun(c4, ccnv(c4)), c2)
  notbid(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, cun(c4, ccnv(c4)), c2), wo(wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c4, c0)))
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, cun(c4, ccnv(c4)), c2), wo(wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c4, c0)), wo(wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c0, ccnv(c4), c2)))
  brun(c0, c4, ccnv(c4), c2)
  orbi2d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c0, ccnv(c4), c2), wbr(c2, c4, c0))
  brcnvg(c0, c1, c2, c1, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm brdifun(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(c0[c3]c2 ‚Üî ¬¨(c0[c4]c2 ‚à® c2[c4]c0)))
  ‚ä£ c3 =((c1 √ó c1)\(c4 ‚ãÉ `' c4))
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), c0[c3]c2, ¬¨(c0[c4]c2 ‚à® c2[c4]c0), ¬¨ c0[(c4 ‚ãÉ `' c4)]c2)
  syl((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), (c0[c3]c2 ‚Üî ¬¨ c0[(c4 ‚ãÉ `' c4)]c2), c0[(c1 √ó c1)]c2)
  sylibr((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), c0[(c1 √ó c1)]c2, < c0, c2 > ‚àà(c1 √ó c1))
  opelxpi(c0, c1, c2, c1)
  df-br(c0, (c1 √ó c1), c2)
  baib(c0[(c1 √ó c1)]c2, c0[c3]c2, ¬¨ c0[(c4 ‚ãÉ `' c4)]c2)
  bitri(c0[c3]c2, (c0[(c1 √ó c1)]c2 ‚àß ¬¨ c0[(c4 ‚ãÉ `' c4)]c2), c0[((c1 √ó c1)\(c4 ‚ãÉ `' c4))]c2)
  breqi(c0, c3, c2, ((c1 √ó c1)\(c4 ‚ãÉ `' c4)))
  brdif(c0, (c1 √ó c1), (c4 ‚ãÉ `' c4), c2)
  notbid((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), c0[(c4 ‚ãÉ `' c4)]c2, (c0[c4]c2 ‚à® c2[c4]c0))
  syl5bb((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), c0[(c4 ‚ãÉ `' c4)]c2, (c0[c4]c2 ‚à® c2[c4]c0), (c0[c4]c2 ‚à® c0[`' c4]c2))
  brun(c0, c4, `' c4, c2)
  orbi2d((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c2 ‚àà c1), c0[c4]c2, c0[`' c4]c2, c2[c4]c0)
  brcnvg(c0, c1, c2, c1, c4)
}

blocks.name: swoer
blocks.content: Incomparability under a strict weak partial order is an equivalence relation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm swoer(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wer(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cdif(cxp(c1, c1), cun(c2, ccnv(c2))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wi(wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  iserd(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, w0)
  a1i(w0, wrel(c0))
  mp2(wrel(c0), wss(c0, cxp(c1, c1)), wrel(cxp(c1, c1)))
  relxp(c1, c1)
  relss(c0, cxp(c1, c1))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))
  simpr(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))
  3bitr4d(wa(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), wn(wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)))), wn(wo(wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)))))
  notbid(wa(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0))), wo(wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))))
  a1i(wa(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wb(wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0))), wo(wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)))))
  orcom(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)))
  syl(wa(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wn(wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wb(wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), wn(wo(wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1))))), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  simprd(wa(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  simpld(wa(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  sylib(wa(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c1), cv(hs1)))
  adantl(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c1), cv(hs1)))
  brdifun(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  mpbird(wa(w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wn(wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c2, cv(hs0)))))
  mtord(wa(w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c2, cv(hs0))), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0))), wo(wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c2, cv(hs1))))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wn(wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))
  simprl(w0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wn(wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  brdifun(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), c0, c2)
  mpbid(wa(w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wn(wo(wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c2, cv(hs1)))), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wb(wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)), wn(wo(wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c2, cv(hs1))))), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))
  brdifun(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2), c0, c2)
  syl6ib(wa(w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c2, cv(hs0))), wo(wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0))), wo(wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c2, cv(hs1)))), wo(wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))), wo(wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs2), c2, cv(hs1)))))
  orim12d(wa(w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs2), c2, cv(hs0)), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2))), wo(wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs2), c2, cv(hs1))))
  syl13anc(wa(w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs2)), wo(wbr(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs2)))), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  swopolem(s2, s0, s1, cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs2), cv(hs1), c2, w0)
  syl6ibr(wa(w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wbr(cv(hs2), c2, cv(hs0)), wo(wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs2), c2, cv(hs1))), wo(wbr(cv(hs2), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0))))
  syl13anc(wa(w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wi(wbr(cv(hs2), c2, cv(hs0)), wo(wbr(cv(hs2), c2, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)))), w0, wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  simpl(w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))))
  syl(wa(w0, wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)))), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c1), cv(hs1)))
  simprbi(wbr(cv(hs0), cxp(c1, c1), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  swopolem(s2, s0, s1, cv(hs2), c1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c2, w0)
  orcom(wbr(cv(hs1), c2, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs2), c2, cv(hs1)))

blocks.name: swoso
blocks.content: If the incomparability relation is equivalent to equality in a subset, then the partial order strictly orders the subset. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm swoso(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wor(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cdif(cxp(c3, c3), cun(c0, ccnv(c0))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wn(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3))), wi(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wo(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  issod(s2, s0, c0, c1, w0)
  sylc(w0, wpo(c0, c1), wss(c1, c3), wpo(c0, c3))
  swopo(s0, s1, s2, c0, c3, w0)
  poss(c1, c3, c0)
  sylibr(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), w3o(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wo(wo(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))))
  orrd(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wo(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
  sylbird(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wn(wo(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)))
  syl(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1))), wb(wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), wn(wo(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  anim12dan(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c3), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  sselda(cv(s2), c1, c3, w0)
  sselda(cv(s0), c1, c3, w0)
  brdifun(cv(s2), c3, cv(s0), c2, c0)
  expr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
  sylan2br(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), w3a(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0))))
  df-3an(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s0)))
  bitri(w3o(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wo(wo(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))), w3o(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0))))
  3orcomb(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))

  swopo(s0, s1, s2, c0, c3, w0)

  sylibr((w0 ‚àß(s2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)), (s2[c0]s0 ‚à® s2 = s0 ‚à® s0[c0]s2), ((s2[c0]s0 ‚à® s0[c0]s2)‚à® s2 = s0))
  orrd((w0 ‚àß(s2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)), (s2[c0]s0 ‚à® s0[c0]s2), s2 = s0)
  sylbird((w0 ‚àß(s2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)), ¬¨(s2[c0]s0 ‚à® s0[c0]s2), s2 = s0, s2[c2]s0)
  syl((w0 ‚àß(s2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)), (s2[c2]s0 ‚Üî ¬¨(s2[c0]s0 ‚à® s0[c0]s2)), (s2 ‚àà c3 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c3))
  anim12dan(w0, s2 ‚àà c1, s0 ‚àà c1, s2 ‚àà c3, s0 ‚àà c3)
  sselda(s2, c1, c3, w0)
  sselda(s0, c1, c3, w0)
  brdifun(s2, c3, s0, c2, c0)
  expr(w0, (s2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1), s2[c2]s0, s2 = s0)
  sylan2br(w0, ((s2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚àß s2[c2]s0), s2 = s0, (s2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s2[c2]s0))
  df-3an(s2 ‚àà c1, s0 ‚àà c1, s2[c2]s0)
  bitri((s2[c0]s0 ‚à® s2 = s0 ‚à® s0[c0]s2), ((s2[c0]s0 ‚à® s0[c0]s2)‚à® s2 = s0), (s2[c0]s0 ‚à® s0[c0]s2 ‚à® s2 = s0))
  3orcomb(s2[c0]s0, s2 = s0, s0[c0]s2)
  df-3or(s2[c0]s0, s0[c0]s2, s2 = s0)

}

thm eqerlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(csb(s2, cv(s0), c1), csb(s2, cv(s1), c1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, copab(s2, s3, wceq(c1, c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(csb(s2, cv(s0), c1), csb(s2, cv(s1), c1))), diffss(s0, s3))
  bitri(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(csb(s2, cv(s0), c1), csb(s2, cv(s1), c1)), wsbc(s2, cv(s0), wsbc(s3, cv(s1), wceq(c1, c2))))
  brabsb(s2, s3, cv(s0), c0, cv(s1), wceq(c1, c2))
  elv(s0, wb(wsbc(s2, cv(s0), wsbc(s3, cv(s1), wceq(c1, c2))), wceq(csb(s2, cv(s0), c1), csb(s2, cv(s1), c1))))
  sbciegf(s2, cv(s0), universe, wsbc(s3, cv(s1), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(csb(s2, cv(s0), c1), csb(s2, cv(s1), c1)))
  nfeq(s2, csb(s2, cv(s0), c1), csb(s2, cv(s1), c1))
  nfcsb1v(s2, cv(s0), c1)
  nfcsb1v(s2, cv(s1), c1)
  syl5bb(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wsbc(s3, cv(s1), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(csb(s2, cv(s0), c1), csb(s2, cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c1, csb(s2, cv(s1), c1)))
  elv(s1, wb(wsbc(s3, cv(s1), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, csb(s2, cv(s1), c1))))
  sbciegf(s3, cv(s1), universe, wceq(c1, c2), wceq(c1, csb(s2, cv(s1), c1)))
  nfv(s3, wceq(c1, csb(s2, cv(s1), c1)))
  eqeq2d(c1, c2, csb(s2, cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1)))
  syl5eqr(c2, csb(s2, cv(s1), c1), csb(s2, cv(s3), c1), wceq(cv(s3), cv(s1)))
  csbie(s2, cv(s3), c1, c2)
  vex(s3)
  csbeq1(s2, cv(s3), cv(s1), c1)
  eqeq1d(c1, csb(s2, cv(s1), c1), csb(s2, cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
  csbeq1a(s2, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, c1, csb(s2, cv(s1), c1))
  diff.csb.s(s3, s2, cv(s1), c1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eqerlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî[s0 / s2]c1 =[s1 / s2]c1)
  ‚ä£ (s2 = s3 ‚Üí c1 = c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 = { < s2, s3 > | c1 = c2 }
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c1)
} = {
  a1ii((s0[c0]s1 ‚Üî[s0 / s2]c1 =[s1 / s2]c1), d(s0, s3))
  bitri(s0[c0]s1, [s0 / s2]c1 =[s1 / s2]c1, [s0 / s2][s1 / s3]c1 = c2)
  brabsb(s2, s3, s0, c0, s1, c1 = c2)
  elv(s0, ([s0 / s2][s1 / s3]c1 = c2 ‚Üî[s0 / s2]c1 =[s1 / s2]c1))
  sbciegf(s2, s0, universe, [s1 / s3]c1 = c2, [s0 / s2]c1 =[s1 / s2]c1)
  nfeq(s2, [s0 / s2]c1, [s1 / s2]c1)
  nfcsb1v(s2, s0, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s2, s1, c1)
  syl5bb(s2 = s0, [s1 / s3]c1 = c2, [s0 / s2]c1 =[s1 / s2]c1, c1 =[s1 / s2]c1)
  elv(s1, ([s1 / s3]c1 = c2 ‚Üî c1 =[s1 / s2]c1))
  sbciegf(s3, s1, universe, c1 = c2, c1 =[s1 / s2]c1)
  nfv(s3, c1 =[s1 / s2]c1)
  eqeq2d(c1, c2, [s1 / s2]c1, s3 = s1)
  syl5eqr(c2, [s1 / s2]c1, [s3 / s2]c1, s3 = s1)
  csbie(s2, s3, c1, c2)
  vex(s3)
  csbeq1(s2, s3, s1, c1)
  eqeq1d(c1, [s1 / s2]c1, [s0 / s2]c1, s2 = s0)
  csbeq1a(s2, s0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, c1, [s1 / s2]c1)
  diff.csb.s(s3, s2, s1, c1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: eqer
blocks.content: Equivalence relation involving equality of dependent classes ` A ( x ) ` and ` B ( y ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 1-May-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqer(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wer(c0, universe)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, wceq(c1, c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  iseri(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, universe)
  relopabi(s0, s1, c0, wceq(c1, c2))
  3imtr4i(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  eqcomd(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)))
  id(wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)))
  eqerlem(hs1, hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  3imtr4i(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2))), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2)), wa(wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs2), c1))), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs2), c1)))
  eqtr(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs2), c1))
  anbi12i(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs2), c1)))
  eqerlem(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  eqerlem(hs1, hs2, s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  eqerlem(hs0, hs2, s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  2th(wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)))
  vex(hs0)
  mpbir(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)))
  eqid(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  eqerlem(hs0, hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs2.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eqer(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ c0[Er]ùïå
  ‚ä£ (s0 = s1 ‚Üí c1 = c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 = { < s0, s1 > | c1 = c2 }
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  iseri(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, universe)
  relopabi(s0, s1, c0, c1 = c2)
  3imtr4i(hs0[c0]hs1, hs1[c0]hs0, [hs0 / s0]c1 =[hs1 / s0]c1, [hs1 / s0]c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)
  eqcomd([hs1 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]c1 =[hs1 / s0]c1)
  id([hs0 / s0]c1 =[hs1 / s0]c1)
  eqerlem(hs1, hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  3imtr4i((hs0[c0]hs1 ‚àß hs1[c0]hs2), hs0[c0]hs2, ([hs0 / s0]c1 =[hs1 / s0]c1 ‚àß[hs1 / s0]c1 =[hs2 / s0]c1), [hs0 / s0]c1 =[hs2 / s0]c1)
  eqtr([hs0 / s0]c1, [hs1 / s0]c1, [hs2 / s0]c1)
  anbi12i(hs0[c0]hs1, hs1[c0]hs2, [hs0 / s0]c1 =[hs1 / s0]c1, [hs1 / s0]c1 =[hs2 / s0]c1)
  eqerlem(hs0, hs1, s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  eqerlem(hs1, hs2, s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  eqerlem(hs0, hs2, s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  2th(hs0 ‚àà ùïå, hs0[c0]hs0)
  vex(hs0)
  mpbir(hs0[c0]hs0, [hs0 / s0]c1 =[hs0 / s0]c1)
  eqid([hs0 / s0]c1)
  eqerlem(hs0, hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs2.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: 0er
blocks.content: The empty set is an equivalence relation on the empty set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 1-May-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm 0er() {
  |- wer(emptycls, emptycls)
} = {
  iseri(hs0, hs1, hs2, emptycls, emptycls)
  rel0()
  sylbi(wbr(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), emptycls, cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), emptycls))
  pm2.21i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), emptycls), wbr(cv(hs1), emptycls, cv(hs0)))
  adantr(wbr(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs1), emptycls, cv(hs2)), wbr(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(hs2)))
  sylbi(wbr(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(hs2)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), emptycls))
  df-br(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(hs1))
  pm2.21i(wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), emptycls), wbr(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(hs2)))
  noel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), emptycls), wbr(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(hs0)), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  2false(wcel(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), emptycls))
  noel(cv(hs0))
  noel(cop(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
  df-br(cv(hs0), emptycls, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs1.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs2.c(emptycls)
}

thm ecdmn0(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cdm(c1)), wne(cec(c0, c1), emptycls))
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, cdm(c1)), wne(cec(c0, c1), emptycls), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, cdm(c1))
  sylbi(wne(cec(c0, c1), emptycls), wcel(c0, universe), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c0, c1))))
  exlimiv(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, universe))
  ecexr(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  3bitr4rd(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)), wne(cec(c0, c1), emptycls), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c0, c1))), wex(hs0, wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))))
  exbidv(hs0, wcel(c0, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)))
  mpan(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  elecg(cv(hs0), universe, c0, universe, c1)
  a1i(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wne(cec(c0, c1), emptycls), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c0, c1)))))
  n0(hs0, cec(c0, c1))
  eldmg(hs0, c0, universe, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cec(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, universe))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà ùïå)

  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: ereldm
blocks.content: Equality of equivalence classes implies equivalence of domain membership. (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ereldm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wer(c3, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c3), cec(c2, c3)))
} = {
  3bitr3d(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c0, cdm(c3)), wcel(c2, cdm(c3)))
  3bitr4g(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(c3)), wcel(c2, cdm(c3)), wne(cec(c0, c3), emptycls), wne(cec(c2, c3), emptycls))
  neeq1d(cec(c0, c3), emptycls, cec(c2, c3), w0)
  ecdmn0(c0, c3)
  ecdmn0(c2, c3)
  eleq2d(c0, cdm(c3), c1, w0)
  eleq2d(c2, cdm(c3), c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cdm(c3), c1), wer(c3, c1))
  erdm(c3, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ereldm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî c2 ‚àà c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3[Er]c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí[c0]c3 =[c2]c3)
} = {
  3bitr3d(w0, c0 ‚àà c1, c2 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà dom(c3), c2 ‚àà dom(c3))
  3bitr4g(w0, c0 ‚àà dom(c3), c2 ‚àà dom(c3), [c0]c3 ‚â† ‚àÖ, [c2]c3 ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  neeq1d([c0]c3, emptycls, [c2]c3, w0)
  ecdmn0(c0, c3)
  ecdmn0(c2, c3)
  eleq2d(c0, dom(c3), c1, w0)
  eleq2d(c2, dom(c3), c1, w0)
  syl(w0, dom(c3)= c1, c3[Er]c1)
  erdm(c3, c1)
}

blocks.name: erth
blocks.content: Basic property of equivalence relations. Theorem 73 of [Suppes] p. 82. (Contributed by NM, 23-Jul-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm erth(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wer(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
} = {
  impbida(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)))
  eqrdv(hs0, cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1), wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2)))
  3bitr4d(wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c2, c1, cv(hs0)))
  impbida(wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c2, c1, cv(hs0)))
  syldanl(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c2, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c2, c1, c0))
  biimpa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0))
  ersymb(c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  impl(w0, wbr(c2, c1, c0), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c2, c1, cv(hs0)))
  ertr(c2, c1, c0, cv(hs0), c3, w0)
  impl(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, cv(hs0)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0)))
  ertr(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0), c3, w0)
  sylancr(wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, c1, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(c0, c3))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c0, c3))
  elecg(cv(hs0), universe, c0, c3, c1)
  sylancr(wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c2, c1)), wbr(c2, c1, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  vex(hs0)
  sylan(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c2, universe), wrel(c1))
  syl(w0, wrel(c1), wer(c1, c3))
  errel(c1, c3)
  brrelex2(c1, c0, c2)
  elecg(cv(hs0), universe, c2, universe, c1)
  ersym(c0, c1, c2, c3, wa(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))), wbr(c2, c1, c0), wcel(c0, cec(c2, c1)))
  eleqtrd(c0, cec(c2, c1), cec(c0, c1), wa(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))), wcel(c0, cec(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, c1, c0))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, c1, c0))
  erref(c0, c1, c3, w0)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))), wb(wcel(c0, cec(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, c1, c0)), wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c0, c3))
  elecg(c0, c3, c0, c3, c1)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))), wb(wcel(c0, cec(c2, c1)), wbr(c2, c1, c0)), wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c3))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c3))
  ereldm(c0, c3, c2, c1, wa(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)), wer(c1, c3))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)))
  elecg(c0, c3, c2, c3, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cec(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cec(c2, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm erth(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]c2 ‚Üî[c0]c1 =[c2]c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1[Er]c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
} = {
  impbida(w0, c0[c1]c2, [c0]c1 =[c2]c1)
  eqrdv(hs0, [c0]c1, [c2]c1, (w0 ‚àß c0[c1]c2))
  3bitr4d((w0 ‚àß c0[c1]c2), hs0 ‚àà[c0]c1, hs0 ‚àà[c2]c1, c0[c1]hs0, c2[c1]hs0)
  impbida((w0 ‚àß c0[c1]c2), c0[c1]hs0, c2[c1]hs0)
  syldanl(w0, c0[c1]c2, c0[c1]hs0, c2[c1]hs0, c2[c1]c0)
  biimpa(w0, c0[c1]c2, c2[c1]c0)
  ersymb(c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  impl(w0, c2[c1]c0, c0[c1]hs0, c2[c1]hs0)
  ertr(c2, c1, c0, hs0, c3, w0)
  impl(w0, c0[c1]c2, c2[c1]hs0, c0[c1]hs0)
  ertr(c0, c1, c2, hs0, c3, w0)
  sylancr((w0 ‚àß c0[c1]c2), (hs0 ‚àà[c0]c1 ‚Üî c0[c1]hs0), hs0 ‚àà ùïå, c0 ‚àà c3)
  adantr(w0, c0[c1]c2, c0 ‚àà c3)
  elecg(hs0, universe, c0, c3, c1)
  sylancr((w0 ‚àß c0[c1]c2), (hs0 ‚àà[c2]c1 ‚Üî c2[c1]hs0), hs0 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  vex(hs0)
  sylan(w0, c0[c1]c2, c2 ‚àà ùïå, Rel(c1))
  syl(w0, Rel(c1), c1[Er]c3)
  errel(c1, c3)
  brrelex2(c1, c0, c2)
  elecg(hs0, universe, c2, universe, c1)
  ersym(c0, c1, c2, c3, (w0 ‚àß[c0]c1 =[c2]c1))
  mpbid((w0 ‚àß[c0]c1 =[c2]c1), c2[c1]c0, c0 ‚àà[c2]c1)
  eleqtrd(c0, [c2]c1, [c0]c1, (w0 ‚àß[c0]c1 =[c2]c1))
  mpbird((w0 ‚àß[c0]c1 =[c2]c1), c0 ‚àà[c0]c1, c0[c1]c0)
  adantr(w0, [c0]c1 =[c2]c1, c0[c1]c0)
  erref(c0, c1, c3, w0)
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß[c0]c1 =[c2]c1), (c0 ‚àà[c0]c1 ‚Üî c0[c1]c0), c0 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c3)
  elecg(c0, c3, c0, c3, c1)
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß[c0]c1 =[c2]c1), (c0 ‚àà[c2]c1 ‚Üî c2[c1]c0), c0 ‚àà c3, c2 ‚àà c3)
  mpbid((w0 ‚àß[c0]c1 =[c2]c1), c2 ‚àà c3, c0 ‚àà c3)
  adantr(w0, [c0]c1 =[c2]c1, c0 ‚àà c3)
  ereldm(c0, c3, c2, c1, (w0 ‚àß[c0]c1 =[c2]c1))
  adantr(w0, [c0]c1 =[c2]c1, c1[Er]c3)
  simpr(w0, [c0]c1 =[c2]c1)
  elecg(c0, c3, c2, c3, c1)
  diff.hs0.c([c0]c1)
  diff.hs0.c([c2]c1)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ‚àß c0[c1]c2))
}

blocks.name: erth2
blocks.content: Basic property of equivalence relations. Compare Theorem 73 of [Suppes] p. 82. Assumes membership of the second argument in the domain. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jul-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: erthi
blocks.content: Basic property of equivalence relations. Part of Lemma 3N of [Enderton] p. 57. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jul-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: erdisj
blocks.content: Equivalence classes do not overlap. In other words, two equivalence classes are either equal or disjoint. Theorem 74 of [Suppes] p. 83. (Contributed by NM, 15-Jun-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm erdisj(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wer(c0, c1), wo(wceq(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)), wceq(cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)), emptycls)))
} = {
  orcomd(wer(c0, c1), wceq(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)), wceq(cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)), emptycls))
  orrd(wer(c0, c1), wceq(cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)), emptycls), wceq(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)))
  syl5bi(wer(c0, c1), wn(wceq(cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)), emptycls)), wceq(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)))))
  neq0(hs0, cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)))
  exlimdv(hs0, wer(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0))), wceq(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)))
  ex(wer(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0))), wceq(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)))
  erthi(c2, c0, c3, c1, wa(wer(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)))))
  ertr4d(c2, c0, c3, c1, cv(hs0), wa(wer(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)))))
  simpl(wer(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0))))
  mpbid(wa(wer(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)))), wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c2, c0)))
  sylancr(wa(wer(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c2, c0)), wbr(c2, c0, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl(wa(wer(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)))), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c2, c0)))
  adantl(wer(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c2, c0)))
  elinel1(cv(hs0), cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0))
  ecexr(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  elecg(cv(hs0), universe, c2, universe, c0)
  mpbid(wa(wer(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)))), wbr(c3, c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c3, c0)))
  sylancr(wa(wer(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c3, c0)), wbr(c3, c0, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  vex(hs0)
  syl(wa(wer(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)))), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c3, c0)))
  adantl(wer(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cec(c3, c0)))
  elinel2(cv(hs0), cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0))
  ecexr(cv(hs0), c3, c0)
  elecg(cv(hs0), universe, c3, universe, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wer(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cec(c2, c0), cec(c3, c0)))
}

thm erdisj(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0[Er]c1 ‚Üí([c2]c0 =[c3]c0 ‚à®([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0)= ‚àÖ))
} = {
  orcomd(c0[Er]c1, [c2]c0 =[c3]c0, ([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0)= ‚àÖ)
  orrd(c0[Er]c1, ([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0)= ‚àÖ, [c2]c0 =[c3]c0)
  syl5bi(c0[Er]c1, ¬¨([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0)= ‚àÖ, [c2]c0 =[c3]c0, ‚àÉ(hs0, hs0 ‚àà([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0)))
  neq0(hs0, ([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0))
  exlimdv(hs0, c0[Er]c1, hs0 ‚àà([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0), [c2]c0 =[c3]c0)
  ex(c0[Er]c1, hs0 ‚àà([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0), [c2]c0 =[c3]c0)
  erthi(c2, c0, c3, c1, (c0[Er]c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0)))
  ertr4d(c2, c0, c3, c1, hs0, (c0[Er]c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0)))
  simpl(c0[Er]c1, hs0 ‚àà([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0))
  mpbid((c0[Er]c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0)), c2[c0]hs0, hs0 ‚àà[c2]c0)
  sylancr((c0[Er]c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0)), (hs0 ‚àà[c2]c0 ‚Üî c2[c0]hs0), hs0 ‚àà ùïå, c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl((c0[Er]c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0)), c2 ‚àà ùïå, hs0 ‚àà[c2]c0)
  adantl(c0[Er]c1, hs0 ‚àà([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0), hs0 ‚àà[c2]c0)
  elinel1(hs0, [c2]c0, [c3]c0)
  ecexr(hs0, c2, c0)
  elecg(hs0, universe, c2, universe, c0)
  mpbid((c0[Er]c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0)), c3[c0]hs0, hs0 ‚àà[c3]c0)
  sylancr((c0[Er]c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0)), (hs0 ‚àà[c3]c0 ‚Üî c3[c0]hs0), hs0 ‚àà ùïå, c3 ‚àà ùïå)
  vex(hs0)
  syl((c0[Er]c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0)), c3 ‚àà ùïå, hs0 ‚àà[c3]c0)
  adantl(c0[Er]c1, hs0 ‚àà([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0), hs0 ‚àà[c3]c0)
  elinel2(hs0, [c2]c0, [c3]c0)
  ecexr(hs0, c3, c0)
  elecg(hs0, universe, c3, universe, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(([c2]c0 ‚ãÇ[c3]c0))
  diff.hs0.w(c0[Er]c1)
  diff.hs0.w([c2]c0 =[c3]c0)
}

blocks.name: ecidsn
blocks.content: An equivalence class modulo the identity relation is a singleton. (Contributed by NM, 24-Oct-2004.)

blocks.name: qseq1
blocks.content: Equality theorem for quotient set. (Contributed by NM, 23-Jul-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm qseq1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cqs(c0, c2), cqs(c1, c2)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cqs(c0, c2), cqs(c1, c2), cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cec(cv(hs1), c2)))), cab(hs0, wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cec(cv(hs1), c2)))), wceq(c0, c1))
  abbidv(hs0, wceq(c0, c1), wrex(hs1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cec(cv(hs1), c2))), wrex(hs1, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cec(cv(hs1), c2))))
  rexeq(hs1, c0, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cec(cv(hs1), c2)))
  df-qs(hs0, hs1, c0, c2)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm qseq1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 = c1 ‚Üí(c0 /. c2)=(c1 /. c2))

  3eqtr4g((c0 /. c2), (c1 /. c2), { hs0 | ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0 =[hs1]c2)}, { hs0 | ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c1, hs0 =[hs1]c2)}, c0 = c1)
  abbidv(hs0, c0 = c1, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0 =[hs1]c2), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c1, hs0 =[hs1]c2))
  rexeq(hs1, c0, c1, hs0 =[hs1]c2)

blocks.name: qseq2
blocks.content: Equality theorem for quotient set. (Contributed by NM, 23-Jul-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm qseq2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cqs(c2, c0), cqs(c2, c1)))
} = {

blocks.name: ecid

blocks.name: qsid
blocks.content: A set is equal to its quotient set mod converse epsilon. (Note: converse epsilon is not an equivalence relation.) (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: ectocld
blocks.content: Implicit substitution of class for equivalence class. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)

thm ectocld(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), w1)
  -| wceq(c1, cqs(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cec(cv(s0), c3), c0), wb(w2, w1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), w2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
} = {
  impel(w0, wcel(c0, c1), w1, wrex(s0, c2, wceq(c0, cec(cv(s0), c3))))
  rexlimdva(s0, c2, w0, wceq(c0, cec(cv(s0), c3)), w1)
  syl5ibcom(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(c0, cec(cv(s0), c3)), w1, w2)
  eqcoms(c0, cec(cv(s0), c3), wb(w2, w1))
  eleq2s(c0, c1, cqs(c2, c3), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(c0, cec(cv(s0), c3))))
  elqsi(s0, c0, c2, c3)
}

  ‚ä£ d(s0, w1)
} = {

}

  opex(cv(hs1), cv(hs0))

thm riiner(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c0, emptycls, wral(s0, c0, wer(c1, c2)), wer(cin(cxp(c2, c2), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), c2))
  mpbiri(wa(wral(s0, c0, wer(c1, c2)), wceq(c0, emptycls)), wer(cin(cxp(c2, c2), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), c2), wer(cxp(c2, c2), c2))
  xpider(c2)
  syl(wa(wral(s0, c0, wer(c1, c2)), wceq(c0, emptycls)), wb(wer(cin(cxp(c2, c2), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), c2), wer(cxp(c2, c2), c2)), wceq(cin(cxp(c2, c2), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), cxp(c2, c2)))
  adantl(wral(s0, c0, wer(c1, c2)), wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(cin(cxp(c2, c2), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), cxp(c2, c2)))
  riin0(s0, c0, cxp(c2, c2), c1)
  ereq1(cin(cxp(c2, c2), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), cxp(c2, c2), c2)
  mpbird(wa(wral(s0, c0, wer(c1, c2)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wer(cin(cxp(c2, c2), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), c2), wer(ciin(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  ancoms(wral(s0, c0, wer(c1, c2)), wne(c0, emptycls), wer(ciin(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  iiner(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  syl(wa(wral(s0, c0, wer(c1, c2)), wne(c0, emptycls)), wb(wer(cin(cxp(c2, c2), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), c2), wer(ciin(s0, c0, c1), c2)), wceq(cin(cxp(c2, c2), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), ciin(s0, c0, c1)))
  sylan(wral(s0, c0, wer(c1, c2)), wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(cin(cxp(c2, c2), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, cxp(c2, c2))))
  ralimi(s0, c0, wer(c1, c2), wss(c1, cxp(c2, c2)))

  ereq1(cin(cxp(c2, c2), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), ciin(s0, c0, c1), c2)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c2, c2)
}

thm qsel(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  ibi(wcel(c4, cec(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c4))
  elvd(hs0, wcel(c4, cec(cv(hs0), c0)), wb(wcel(c4, cec(cv(hs0), c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c4)))
  elecg(c4, cec(cv(hs0), c0), cv(hs0), universe, c0)
  ex(wa(wer(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c4), wceq(cec(cv(hs0), c0), cec(c4, c0)))
  erthi(cv(hs0), c0, c4, c1, wa(wa(wer(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wbr(cv(hs0), c0, c4)))

  erthi(hs0, c0, c4, c1, ((c0[Er]c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c3)‚àß hs0[c0]c4))
  simpll(c0[Er]c1, hs0 ‚àà c3, hs0[c0]c4)
  simpr((c0[Er]c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c3), hs0[c0]c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0[Er]c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c4 ‚àà c2 ‚Üí c2 =[c4]c0))
}

blocks.name: uniinqs
blocks.content: Class union distributes over the intersection of two subclasses of a quotient space. Compare ~ uniin . (Contributed by FL, 25-May-2007.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2014.)

thm uniinqs(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))), wceq(cuni(cin(c0, c3)), cin(cuni(c0), cuni(c3))))
  -| wer(c2, c4)
} = {
  eqssd(cuni(cin(c0, c3)), cin(cuni(c0), cuni(c3)), wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))))
  a1i(wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))), wss(cuni(cin(c0, c3)), cin(cuni(c0), cuni(c3))))
  uniin(c0, c3)
  ssrdv(hs0, cin(cuni(c0), cuni(c3)), cuni(cin(c0, c3)), wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))))
  syl5bi(wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cuni(c0), cuni(c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c0, c3))), wrex(hs1, c0, wrex(hs2, c3, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cuni(c0), cuni(c3))), wrex(hs1, c0, wrex(hs2, c3, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c3))), wa(wrex(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wrex(hs2, c3, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))))
  anbi12i(wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c3)), wrex(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wrex(hs2, c3, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  eluni2(hs1, cv(hs0), c0)
  eluni2(hs2, cv(hs0), c3)
  elin(cv(hs0), cuni(c0), cuni(c3))
  reeanv(hs1, hs2, c0, c3, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))
  rexlimdvva(hs1, hs2, c0, c3, wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c0, c3))))
  3expia(wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c0, c3))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c0, c3))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), cin(c0, c3)))
  simp3l(wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))
  elind(cv(hs1), c0, c3, w3a(wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))))
  eqeltrd(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2), w3a(wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))))
  mpd(w3a(wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wne(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), emptycls))
  3ad2ant3(wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), wne(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), emptycls))
  inelcm(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  necon1ad(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), emptycls, w3a(wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))
  ord(w3a(wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wceq(cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), emptycls))
  qsdisj(cv(hs1), cv(hs2), c2, c4, c1, w3a(wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))))
  a1i(w3a(wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))), wer(c2, c4))
  sseldd(cv(hs1), cqs(c1, c2), c0, w3a(wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))))
  simp1l(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  simp2l(wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c3), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  sseldd(cv(hs2), cqs(c1, c2), c3, w3a(wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))))
  simp1r(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  simp2r(wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c3), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))))
  elunii(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cin(c0, c3))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(cuni(c0), cuni(c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(cin(c0, c3)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wss(c0, cqs(c1, c2)), wss(c3, cqs(c1, c2))))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(c3)

  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)

blocks.name: qliftlem
blocks.content: ` F ` , a function lift, is a subset of ` R X. S ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2016.)

thm qliftlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cec(cv(s0), c1), cqs(c0, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cec(cv(s0), c1), c3))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wer(c1, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cec(cv(s0), c1), cqs(c0, c1))), wceq(c2, crn(cmpt(s0, c0, cop(cec(cv(s0), c1), c3)))))
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cec(cv(s0), c1), cqs(c0, c1))), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c3, c4)))
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cec(cv(s0), c1), cqs(c0, c1))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cec(cv(s0), c1), cqs(c0, c1))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cec(cv(s0), c1), cqs(c0, c1))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cec(cv(s0), c1), cqs(c0, c1))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cec(cv(s0), c1), cqs(c0, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))
  sylc(w0, wcel(c1, universe), wer(c1, c0), wcel(c0, universe))
  erex(c1, c0, universe)
  ecelqsg(c1, universe, cv(s0), c0)
}

thm brecop(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0, wff w1) {

blocks.content: Binary relation on a quotient set. Lemma for real number construction. Eliminates antecedent from last hypothesis. (Contributed by NM, 13-Feb-1996.) (Revised by AV, 12-Jul-2022.)

  syl(wbr(co(c0, c6, c5), c7, co(c1, c6, c4)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c8), wcel(c5, c8)), wa(wcel(c1, c8), wcel(c4, c8))), wa(wcel(co(c0, c6, c5), c8), wcel(co(c1, c6, c4), c8)))

blocks.name: ecopoveq
blocks.content: This is the first of several theorems about equivalence relations of the kind used in construction of fractions and signed reals, involving operations on equivalent classes of ordered pairs. This theorem expresses the relation ` .~ ` (specified by the hypothesis) in terms of its operation ` F ` . (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1995.)

blocks.name: ecopovtrn
blocks.content: Assuming that operation ` F ` is commutative (second hypothesis), closed (third hypothesis), associative (fourth hypothesis), and has the cancellation property (fifth hypothesis), show that the relation ` .~ ` , specified by the first hypothesis, is transitive. (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.)

blocks.content: Assuming that operation ` F ` is commutative (second hypothesis), closed (third hypothesis), associative (fourth hypothesis), and has the cancellation property (fifth hypothesis), show that the relation ` .~ ` , specified by the first hypothesis, is an equivalence relation. (Contributed by NM, 16-Feb-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 1-May-2021.)

thm eceqoveq(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {

blocks.name: ecovcom
blocks.content: Lemma used to transfer a commutative law via an equivalence relation. (Contributed by NM, 29-Aug-1995.) (Revised by David Abernethy, 4-Jun-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm ecovcom(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c2, c3, c0)))
  -| wceq(c1, cqs(cxp(c4, c4), c5))
  -| wi(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c4), wcel(cv(s3), c4))), wceq(co(cec(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c5), c3, cec(cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c5)), cec(cop(c6, c7), c5)))
  -| wi(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c4), wcel(cv(s3), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c4))), wceq(co(cec(cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c5), c3, cec(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c5)), cec(cop(c8, c9), c5)))
  -| wceq(c6, c8)
  -| wceq(c7, c9)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
